Description:
When you finish off the last naga, fire arrows begin to fall from the sky, when you look where they come from you see an army of crocomen at the top of the falls.

They won't take long to catch you and they clearly want revenge for what you did to their village.

An even denser wave of fire arrows start falling on you and your only option is to try to dodge them and advance before the army of crocomen catches you.
DescriptionAction: Do your best to evade the fire arrows.
